Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Lake/Cuyler
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, due to street blockage near Lake/Cuyler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, Division, Austin, Augusta and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Lake/Cuyler.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Harlem Reroute near Harlem/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand  then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood, due to fire department activity near 79th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Greenwood then resume their normal rout on 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Woodlawn.
